THE SATURDAY EVENING POST
London will be only 13½ hours
from New York on the huge
new super-o CuDDers.
Now you can fly to
EUROPE
for only
$270
CONDON AMSTER
• FRANKFURT
PARIS
... on "The Rainbow," Pan American's
new Tourist service. All flights in
brand-new Douglas Super-6 Clippers
Yes, starting May 1st, Pan American will offer over-
night flights to Europe on "The Rainbow." You'll save
a big $125 over the first-class fare .
. $225 on the
round trip. Here are some typical examples:
From New York to
One way
Ireland…
• $241
London.
• $270.
Paris...
$290.
Frankfurt.
• $313.10.
Round trip
....$433.80
$486
. $522
. $563.60
Similar low fares to all other cities in Europe.
Moreover, Pan American will fly you in brand-new air-
liners that were specially designed for this service. They
will be manned by the same experienced overocean Flight
crews who operate Pan American's deluxe service.
During the flight attractive, satisfying meals will be
served at low prices.
• Especially-built Clippers. Pan American will be ready
this summer with a whole fleet of Douglas Super-6 Clippers.
These 4-engine, pressurized Clippers are the fastest ever
built, they're the world's most modern airliners and were
ordered especially for Pan American's "Rainbow" service.
They'll fly you to Europe overnight!
Many flights are already heavily booked. Better make
your reservations as soon as you can! Call your Travel
Agent or Pan American.
NEW HORIZONS
Best Seller! PACKSO W NEED!
75,000 copies of this travel handbook
ing factsabout hotels and
what to do, see, buy, eat and wear abroad
Last night you left New York... today you're in Paris (above)—thanks to the speed of Pan American's
superb new Super-6 Clippers. Your one Pan American ticket on "The Rainbow" will take you to as many
European cities as you choose. Plan to go this year—at Pan American's new low Clipper Tourist fares!
PAN AMERICAN
World's Most Experienced Airline
PAN AMERICAN, Dept. NH-9
Enclosed is one dollar. Please send my copy of
"New Horizons," postpaid.
(please print)
Street
properties.sfomuseum:description: Advertisement from April 12, 1952 issue of Saturday Evening Post promoting Pan American World Airways, titled “Now you can fly to Europe for only $270” with color image depicting tourists seated at outdoor cafe.
properties.sfomuseum:subject: Pan Am promotional advertisement
